You invoke the finality of a life-giving spring, and water sprouts at your feet and springs forth in all its vitality. You grant temporary hit points to a number of creatures within 30 feet of you that lasts for 1 minute. @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.macros.Macro.xumjguwPtOtkC7tL]{Spend your Zeal}. The amount of Zeal you spend determines the number of targets and the amount of temporary hit points:

  • 1 Zeal: 1 ally for half your level’s worth of temporary hit points [[/r (@actor.level/2)[healing] #Temporary HIt Points]]

  • 2-3 Zeal: 3 allies for half your level’s worth of temporary hit points

  • 4-5 Zeal: 3 allies for your level’s worth of temporary hit points. [[/r (@actor.level)[healing] #Temporary HIt Points]]

At 18th level, you target 3 allies when you spend 1 Zeal and any number of creatures when you spend 2 to 5 Zeal.
